doc.title: Web server

value.content: A web server is a piece of software that often runs on a hardware server offering service to a user, usually referred to as the client. A server, on the other hand, is a piece of hardware that lives in a room full of computers, commonly known as a data center.

value.title: See also
value.content:
• Introduction to servers
  • Server (computing) on Wikipedia
